component:ember-mapbox-gl/components/map.title: MapboxGL
component:ember-mapbox-gl/components/map.text: Component that creates a new mapbox-gl-js instance: {{#mapbox-gl initOptions=initOptions mapLoaded=(action 'mapLoaded') as |map|}} {{/mapbox-gl}}

attributes.name: MapboxGL
attributes.description:
Component that creates a new mapbox-gl-js instance:

{{#mapbox-gl initOptions=initOptions mapLoaded=(action 'mapLoaded') as |map|}}

{{/mapbox-gl}}

arguments.name: initOptions
arguments.description: An options hash to pass on to the mapbox-gl-js instance. This is only used during map construction, and updates will have no effect.

arguments.name: mapLoaded
arguments.description: An action function to call when the map has finished loading. Note that the component does not yield until the map has loaded, so this is the only way to listen for the mapbox load event.

component:ember-mapbox-gl/components/map.title: MapboxGLCallComponent
component:ember-mapbox-gl/components/map.text: A component used to call a specific Mapbox GL method.

attributes.name: MapboxGLCallComponent
attributes.description: A component used to call a specific Mapbox GL method.

component:ember-mapbox-gl/components/map.title: MapboxGlImageComponent
component:ember-mapbox-gl/components/map.text: Adds an image for use in the map, see here. Properties name The unique name for the image. The name will be referenced in a source layer as the icon-image. Reference layers-symbol for more details. Property can also be used as the first positional parameter.   image The path to your image, typically /assets/<some_image>. Property can also be used as the second positional parameter.   width The width of the image in pixels.   height The height of the image in pixels.    Example {{#mapbox-gl as |map|}} {{map.image 'cat' '/assets/cat.png' width=48 height=48}} {{!-- `name` and `icon-image` used as positional params above --}} {{#map.source options=(hash type='geojson' data=marker) as |source|}} {{source.layer layer=(hash type='symbol' layout=(hash icon-image='cat' icon-size=0.25))}} {{/map.source}} {{/mapbox-gl}} import Controller from '@ember/controller'; export default Controller.extend({ marker: { type: 'FeatureCollection', features: [ { type: 'Feature', geometry: { type: 'Point', coordinates: [ -96.7969879, 32.7766642 ] } } ] } });

attributes.name: MapboxGlImageComponent
attributes.description:
Adds an image for use in the map, see here.

Properties

  • name
    • The unique name for the image. The name will be referenced in a source layer as the icon-image. Reference layers-symbol for more details. Property can also be used as the first positional parameter.
  • image
    • The path to your image, typically /assets/<some_image>. Property can also be used as the second positional parameter.
  • width
    • The width of the image in pixels.
  • height
    • The height of the image in pixels.

Example

{{#mapbox-gl as |map|}}
  {{map.image 'cat' '/assets/cat.png' width=48 height=48}}
  {{!-- `name` and `icon-image` used as positional params above --}}

  {{#map.source options=(hash type='geojson' data=marker) as |source|}}
    {{source.layer layer=(hash
        type='symbol'
        layout=(hash
          icon-image='cat'
          icon-size=0.25))}}
  {{/map.source}}
{{/mapbox-gl}}
import Controller from '@ember/controller';

export default Controller.extend({
  marker: {
    type: 'FeatureCollection',
    features: [
      {
        type: 'Feature',
        geometry: { type: 'Point', coordinates: [ -96.7969879, 32.7766642 ] }
      }
    ]
  }
});

component:ember-mapbox-gl/components/map.title: MapboxGLSource
component:ember-mapbox-gl/components/map.text: Adds a data source to the map. The API matches the mapbox source docs. Example: {{#mapbox-gl as |map|}} {{#map.source options=(hash type='geojson' data=(hash type='FeatureCollection' features=(array (hash type='Feature' geometry=(hash type='Point' coordinates=(array -96.7969879 32.7766642) ) ) ) )) as |source|}} {{source.layer layer=(hash type='circle' paint=(hash circle-color='#007cbf' circle-radius=10))}} {{/map.source}} {{/mapbox-gl}}

attributes.name: MapboxGLSource
attributes.description:
Adds a data source to the map. The API matches the mapbox source docs.

Example:

{{#mapbox-gl as |map|}}
  {{#map.source options=(hash
    type='geojson'
    data=(hash
      type='FeatureCollection'
      features=(array
        (hash
          type='Feature'
          geometry=(hash
            type='Point'
            coordinates=(array -96.7969879 32.7766642)
          )
        )
      )
    )) as |source|}}
    {{source.layer layer=(hash
        type='circle'
        paint=(hash circle-color='#007cbf' circle-radius=10))}}
  {{/map.source}}
{{/mapbox-gl}}

arguments.name: layer
arguments.description: A hash to pass on to the mapbox layer.

arguments.name: before
arguments.description: The ID of an existing layer to insert the new layer before. If this argument is omitted, the layer will be appended to the end of the layers array.

component:ember-mapbox-gl/components/map.title: MapboxGlMarker
component:ember-mapbox-gl/components/map.text: A utility that brokers HTTP requests...

attributes.name: MapboxGlMarker
attributes.description: A utility that brokers HTTP requests...

component:ember-mapbox-gl/components/map.title: MapboxGLOn
component:ember-mapbox-gl/components/map.text: Adds an action to listen for mapbox events. Positional Parameters eventSource The first positional parameter. The event type to listen for.   action The second positional parameter. The action provided by the consumer to call when the event is triggered.    Example {{#mapbox-gl as |map|}} {{map.on 'click' (action 'mapClicked')}} {{/mapbox-gl}} import Controller from '@ember/controller'; export default Controller.extend({ actions: { mapClicked({ target: map, point }) { console.log(map, point); } } });

attributes.name: MapboxGLOn
attributes.description:
Adds an action to listen for mapbox events.

Positional Parameters

  • eventSource
    • The first positional parameter. The event type to listen for.
  • action
    • The second positional parameter. The action provided by the consumer to call when the event is triggered.

Example

{{#mapbox-gl as |map|}}
  {{map.on 'click' (action 'mapClicked')}}
{{/mapbox-gl}}
import Controller from '@ember/controller';

export default Controller.extend({
  actions: {
    mapClicked({ target: map, point }) {
      console.log(map, point);
    }
  }
});

component:ember-mapbox-gl/components/map.title: MapboxGLPopup
component:ember-mapbox-gl/components/map.text: Adds a popup to the map. Properties lngLat The longitude and latitude to pin the popup at.    Example {{#mapbox-gl as |map|}} {{#map.source options=(hash type='geojson' data=(hash type='FeatureCollection' features=(array (hash type='Feature' geometry=(hash type='Point' coordinates=(array -96.7969879 32.7766642) ) ) ) )) as |source|}} {{source.layer layer=(hash type='circle' paint=(hash circle-color='#007cbf' circle-radius=10))}} {{/map.source}} {{#map.popup lngLat=(array -96.7969879 32.7766642)}} Dallas, TX {{/map.popup}} {{/mapbox-gl}}

attributes.name: MapboxGLPopup
attributes.description:
Adds a popup to the map.

Properties

  • lngLat
    • The longitude and latitude to pin the popup at.

Example

{{#mapbox-gl as |map|}}
  {{#map.source options=(hash
    type='geojson'
    data=(hash
      type='FeatureCollection'
      features=(array
        (hash
          type='Feature'
          geometry=(hash
            type='Point'
            coordinates=(array -96.7969879 32.7766642)
          )
        )
      )
    )) as |source|}}
    {{source.layer layer=(hash
        type='circle'
        paint=(hash circle-color='#007cbf' circle-radius=10))}}
  {{/map.source}}

  {{#map.popup lngLat=(array -96.7969879 32.7766642)}}
    Dallas, TX
  {{/map.popup}}
{{/mapbox-gl}}

component:ember-mapbox-gl/components/map.title: MapboxGLSource
component:ember-mapbox-gl/components/map.text: Adds a data source to the map. The API matches the mapbox source docs. Example: {{#mapbox-gl as |map|}} {{#map.source options=(hash type='geojson' data=(hash type='FeatureCollection' features=(array (hash type='Feature' geometry=(hash type='Point' coordinates=(array -96.7969879 32.7766642) ) ) ) ))}} {{/map.source}} {{/mapbox-gl}}

attributes.name: MapboxGLSource
attributes.description:
Adds a data source to the map. The API matches the mapbox source docs.

Example:

{{#mapbox-gl as |map|}}
  {{#map.source options=(hash
    type='geojson'
    data=(hash
      type='FeatureCollection'
      features=(array
        (hash
          type='Feature'
          geometry=(hash
            type='Point'
            coordinates=(array -96.7969879 32.7766642)
          )
        )
      )
    ))}}
  {{/map.source}}
{{/mapbox-gl}}

fields.name: options
fields.description: The ID of the source to add. Must not conflict with existing sources. {@link https://www.mapbox.com/mapbox-gl-js/api/#map#addsource Mapbox}

arguments.name: options
arguments.description:
An options hash to set as the source.

  • options.type

    • A string detailing the map source type. Typically geojson.

  • options.data

    • A data hash for the map, following the source.data API detailed by mapbox docs.

template:docs/actions.title: Capturing Events
template:docs/actions.text: Capturing Events Note: The example below uses ember-composable-helpers. Add the following map options to config/environment.js to style the map, set a default zoom level, and to provide a default centerpoint: 'mapbox-gl': { accessToken: 'ACCESS TOKEN HERE', map: { style: 'mapbox://styles/mapbox/basic-v9', zoom: 13, center: [ -96.7969879, 32.7766642 ] } }, import Controller from '@ember/controller'; export default Controller.extend({ marker: { type: 'FeatureCollection', features: [ { type: 'Feature', geometry: { type: 'Point', coordinates: [ -96.7969879, 32.7766642 ] } } ] }, actions: { mapClicked({ target: map, point }) { console.log(map, point); } } }); {{#mapbox-gl class='map-container' initOptions=(hash pitch=30) as |map|}} {{map.on 'click' (action 'mapClicked')}} {{#map.source options=(hash type='geojson' data=marker) as |source|}} {{source.layer layer=(hash type='circle' paint=(hash circle-color='#007cbf' circle-radius=10))}} {{/map.source}} {{/mapbox-gl}} The above example does the following: Creates an instance of a map Attaches a mapClicked action when anywhere on the map is clicked Generates a geojson map source (marker) Draws a blue circle on the map at the coordinates provided by marker

template:docs/container.title: The Container
template:docs/container.text: The Container Note: The example below uses ember-composable-helpers. Add the following map options to config/environment.js to style the map, set a default zoom level, and to provide a default centerpoint: 'mapbox-gl': { accessToken: 'ACCESS TOKEN HERE', map: { style: 'mapbox://styles/mapbox/basic-v9', zoom: 13, center: [ -96.7969879, 32.7766642 ] } }, import Controller from '@ember/controller'; export default Controller.extend({ marker: { type: 'FeatureCollection', features: [ { type: 'Feature', geometry: { type: 'Point', coordinates: [ -96.7969879, 32.7766642 ] } } ] }, actions: { mapClicked({ target: map, point }) { console.log(map, point); } } }); {{#mapbox-gl class='map-container' initOptions=(hash pitch=30) as |map|}} {{map.on 'click' (action 'mapClicked')}} {{#map.source options=(hash type='geojson' data=marker) as |source|}} {{source.layer layer=(hash type='circle' paint=(hash circle-color='#007cbf' circle-radius=10))}} {{/map.source}} {{/mapbox-gl}} The above example does the following: Creates an instance of a map Attaches a mapClicked action when anywhere on the map is clicked Generates a geojson map source (marker) Draws a blue circle on the map at the coordinates provided by marker

template:docs/index.title: Introduction
template:docs/index.text: Introduction Ember integration with mapbox-gl-js. Installation ember install ember-mapbox-gl Then, add your Mapbox access token to config/environment.js: module.exports = function(environment) { let ENV = { 'mapbox-gl': { accessToken: 'ACCESS TOKEN HERE' }, } Static Build By default, ember-mapbox-gl will load the mapbox-gl library dynamically via ember-auto-import's dynamic import support. If you would prefer for mapbox-gl-js to not be loaded dynamically, include an import 'mapbox-gl'; somewhere in your app and ember-auto-import will include it in your vendor bundle.

template:docs/installation.title: Installation
template:docs/installation.text: Installation Note: The example below uses ember-composable-helpers. Add the following map options to config/environment.js to style the map, set a default zoom level, and to provide a default centerpoint: 'mapbox-gl': { accessToken: 'ACCESS TOKEN HERE', map: { style: 'mapbox://styles/mapbox/basic-v9', zoom: 13, center: [ -96.7969879, 32.7766642 ] } }, import Controller from '@ember/controller'; export default Controller.extend({ marker: { type: 'FeatureCollection', features: [ { type: 'Feature', geometry: { type: 'Point', coordinates: [ -96.7969879, 32.7766642 ] } } ] }, actions: { mapClicked({ target: map, point }) { console.log(map, point); } } }); {{#mapbox-gl class='map-container' initOptions=(hash pitch=30) as |map|}} {{map.on 'click' (action 'mapClicked')}} {{#map.source options=(hash type='geojson' data=marker) as |source|}} {{source.layer layer=(hash type='circle' paint=(hash circle-color='#007cbf' circle-radius=10))}} {{/map.source}} {{/mapbox-gl}} The above example does the following: Creates an instance of a map Attaches a mapClicked action when anywhere on the map is clicked Generates a geojson map source (marker) Draws a blue circle on the map at the coordinates provided by marker

template:docs/templates.text: Templates Note: The example below uses ember-composable-helpers. Add the following map options to config/environment.js to style the map, set a default zoom level, and to provide a default centerpoint: 'mapbox-gl': { accessToken: 'ACCESS TOKEN HERE', map: { style: 'mapbox://styles/mapbox/basic-v9', zoom: 13, center: [ -96.7969879, 32.7766642 ] } }, import Controller from '@ember/controller'; export default Controller.extend({ marker: { type: 'FeatureCollection', features: [ { type: 'Feature', geometry: { type: 'Point', coordinates: [ -96.7969879, 32.7766642 ] } } ] }, actions: { mapClicked({ target: map, point }) { console.log(map, point); } } }); {{#mapbox-gl class='map-container' initOptions=(hash pitch=30) as |map|}} {{map.on 'click' (action 'mapClicked')}} {{#map.source options=(hash type='geojson' data=marker) as |source|}} {{source.layer layer=(hash type='circle' paint=(hash circle-color='#007cbf' circle-radius=10))}} {{/map.source}} {{/mapbox-gl}} The above example does the following: Creates an instance of a map Attaches a mapClicked action when anywhere on the map is clicked Generates a geojson map source (marker) Draws a blue circle on the map at the coordinates provided by marker

template:docs/usage.title: Usage
template:docs/usage.text: Usage Note: The example below uses ember-composable-helpers. Add the following map options to config/environment.js to style the map, set a default zoom level, and to provide a default centerpoint: 'mapbox-gl': { accessToken: 'ACCESS TOKEN HERE', map: { style: 'mapbox://styles/mapbox/basic-v9', zoom: 13, center: [ -96.7969879, 32.7766642 ] } }, import Controller from '@ember/controller'; export default Controller.extend({ marker: { type: 'FeatureCollection', features: [ { type: 'Feature', geometry: { type: 'Point', coordinates: [ -96.7969879, 32.7766642 ] } } ] }, actions: { mapClicked({ target: map, point }) { console.log(map, point); } } }); {{#mapbox-gl class='map-container' initOptions=(hash pitch=30) as |map|}} {{map.on 'click' (action 'mapClicked')}} {{#map.source options=(hash type='geojson' data=marker) as |source|}} {{source.layer layer=(hash type='circle' paint=(hash circle-color='#007cbf' circle-radius=10))}} {{/map.source}} {{/mapbox-gl}} The above example does the following: Creates an instance of a map Attaches a mapClicked action when anywhere on the map is clicked Generates a geojson map source (marker) Draws a blue circle on the map at the coordinates provided by marker
